cs.ualberta.ca.tunein

Class ThreadController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.tunein.ThreadController

  • public class ThreadController
extends Object
    Controller ThreadController Class: This is part of the controller that controls a list of comments and modifies the comments in the list passed to the controller.
